page.title: 19River Ouse <2>
page.content: The new path will cross a new foot bridge along the bank. {Floods}in the past have caused great {damage }at Chandos Park{Bowling }Green and Ford Meadow{Football}Ground. In the old days the flooding was worse because before the {bridge}at Bridge Street there was no other way to get to the weekly market. So when there were {floods }it was {dangerous even at the Ford to try and get cattle across the river. Well Street School and the Woolpack Inn are even nowdays under water quite often in Winter. And the grounds of low lying {houses} has often been {flooded. A panel has been chosen by the AVDC to examine the smaller details of the schemes. Also the AWA is offering public meetings to discuss the{flood {schemes.
